author: paperliss
content: I have heard that right after the merge, there will be "skinny withdraws," allowing 4 validators to exit per slot. Is this true?

author: bridge-bot
content: <dannyryan> Validators can already exit ~4 per slot

author: bridge-bot
content: <dannyryan> Any withdrawal mechanism will allow *at least* 4 withdrawals per slot to mirror this exit throttle

author: bridge-bot
content: <dannyryan> this is not “skinny withdrawals”, it’s just withdrawals

author: bridge-bot
content:
<dannyryan> Withdrawals CL tracking issue here — https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/2758
and meta-spec here — https://notes.ethereum.org/@ralexstokes/Skp1mPSb9
